org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db

Class DBOutputFormat.DBRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.RecordWriter<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.db.DBOutputFormat.DBRecordWriter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    Enclosing class:
    DBOutputFormat<K extends DBWritable,V>

    @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class DBOutputFormat.DBRecordWriter
extends RecordWriter<K,V>
    A RecordWriter that writes the reduce output to a SQL table
